articles.title: Scientists find quasi-moon orbiting the Earth for the last 60 years—and it's not the first one - Phys.org
articles.description: Everyone who has ever lived on Earth has been well-aware of the moon, but it turns out Earth also has some frequent temporary companions. These "quasi-moons" are small asteroids that enter into a kind of resonance with Earth's orbit, although they aren't tech…
